Hi all Pros

I am new to junit and have a task at hand. i need to build an automation
test suite using junit to test these API. the api's called using http
request ( its like http://api.xyz.com?a=0&b=1&.c=1  etc...)and the response
is returned in XML / json and php format.

each response has to be parsed and take few of the parameters from the
response and build a new http request and send it again. or call a different
API with new param after I parse the first one.
can anyone Suggest me any book, online doc etc for the same. and also get me
started with this automation suite. how should I start with this task.

any inputs will be very helpful.

Thabk you very much !

Cheers, S
